description: Soft-side luggage has malleable fabric in the outer shell to contort into confined spaces. The best materials include durable woven nylon, ballistic nylon, and ripstop nylon.

products.name: TravelPro Maxlite Softside
products.description: Lightweight nylon softside luggage perfect for short trips.

products.name: Briggs & Riley Baseline
products.description: Elegant softside luggage with plenty of interior storage.

products.name: Samsonite Solyte DLX
products.description: Softside luggage with easy-glide wheels and expandable compartments.

products.name: American Tourister Fieldbrook II
products.description: Affordable softside luggage, perfect for budget travelers.
